content: le square is a stunning lightweight shawl designed by **lisa di fruscia** for sonder yarn co with luna - our exquisite 100% bluefaced leicester lace weight yarn it is begun at the center and worked outwards in the round alternate cast-on directions are provided if you prefer to begin your shawl flat and then join in the round when you are comfortable doing so yarn is carried up between sections so there are very few ends to weave in at the end this is a project for both the process and product knitters among us it s not a quick project but the finished piece will be worth every moment of your time ⁠ **yarn** sonder yarn co luna 100% bluefaced leicester 800 m 875 y / 100 g mc 3 skeins shown in leonard or approximately 2182 m 2386 y of lace weight yarn cc 1 skein shown in cinema or approximately 290 m 317 y of lace weight yarn **finished dimensions** 130 cm x 130 cm 51 x 51 180 cm 71 wingspan x 90 cm 35 5 depth when folded into atriangle
